intro:
It's time for a scrumptious oden-making challenge!
Make as much as you can and watch your food cart prosper!
description:
Let's make oden on the Nintendo Switch™!
Every customer has unique tastes—keep track of each order and don't mess up!
Prepare every order accurately and quickly to keep your customers satisfied!
Share Joy-Con™, and up to 4 players can join in!
Reach for the ultimate high score!

《Rules》
Stew the ingredients according to your customer's order!
Watch your ingredients carefully as they simmer—if they sit too long, they'll fall apart!
Dish up as much oden as you can to your customers before time runs out!

《How to Play》
1. Add ingredients to the pots!

2. Stew the ingredients until their flavors are just right!

3. When you have all the ingredients ready for an order, serve them up!

[Score Attack]
Compete on the global leaderboards with your best score!
Cook skillfully, fill more and more orders, and achieve a new high score!

[Battle]
Have an oden-making showdown with up to 4 players!
Speed and accuracy are the keys to victory!
